did.abstract: Youth ministry of the Presbyterian Church, Michigan Synod. Minutes of meetings, notebooks of the Westminster Fellowship, bulletins, and other miscellanea.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The records were donated by the Synod of Michigan of the United Presbyterian Church (donor no. 3821).

accruals.p: No further additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, United Presbyterian Youth (Mich.) records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The United Presbyterian Youth is an organization within the Synod of Michigan of the United Presbyterian Church established to minister to young people with a variety of programs and activities.

scopecontent.p: The record group includes minutes of meetings, notebooks of the Westminster Fellowship, bulletins, and other miscellanea.

did.unittitle: Notebook; include minutes of Presbyterian Youth organizations, 1937-1954
